msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; the names of the Trinity; the names of the protagonists. A few lines alternating with black lines in the incipit page of Texts I and III and on fol. 4rb (incipit page of the account proper of Text I), and a few lines in the incipit of Text II; initial lines of some paragraphs in Texts I and II; the exhortation sǝmʿu... in Text I (fols. 13vb, 14rb); incipit of each miracle (Text II); the word halle luya (halleluiah) on fol. 10vb and the words sälam; some corrections (words or letters) interlineally. Elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals or their elements; elements of the quire marks and of the marginal notes; elements of the text dividers.

msItem.note: II-1) Miracle of the divine punishment (birds drinking human being’s brains) (fols. 23rb-24vb) (ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ጸሎቶሙ፡ ወበረከቶሙ፡... ወኮነ፡ በቀዳሚ፡ መዋዕል፡ አመ፡ ተምዕዓ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ መዓተ፡ ዓቢየ፨ ወፈነወ፡ አዕዋፈ፡ ዐበይተ፡ እለ፡ ይሴፅሩ፡ ርእሰ፡ [fol. 22va] ሰብእ፡ በአፉሆሙ፡ ወይሰትዩ፡ ናላሁ፨...)
II-2) Miracle of the jar with holy water that did not break (fols. 24vb-25vb) (፪ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... [fol. 25ra] ወካዕበ፡ ነሥአ፡ ውእቱ፡ ብእሴ፡ እግዚኣብሔር፡ ገብረ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ኵስኵስተ፡ ቤተ፡ መቅደስ፡ ከመ፡ ይቅዳሕ፡ ማየ፡ ጸሎት፨ …)
II-3) Miracle of the healing of Queen ʾƎgziʾ Kǝbra (fols. 25vb-29ra) (፫ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... ወካዕበ፡ ስምዑ፡ አኃውየ፡ ዘገብሩ፡ ላቲ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ ጻድቃን፡ ውሉደ፡ ብርሃን፡ ለእግዚእ፡ ክብራ፡ በእሲተ፡ ንጉሠ፡ ኢትዮጵያ፡ ...)
II-4) Miracle of the healing of a blind man (fols. 29ra-30ra) (ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለጻድቃን፡ … ወሖረ፡ አሐዱ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዕዉረ፡ ዓይን፡ እንዘ፡ ይመርህዎ፡ እምድረ፡ በለሰ፨...)

II-5) Miracle of the holy water of Ṗäraqliṭos extinguishing fire in the King’s palace at ʾAwogär (fols. 30ra-30vb) (፭ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... ስምዑ፡ አኀውየ፡ ዘከመ፡ ቦአ፡ እሳተ፡ ሰማይ፡ ወስተ፡ ቤተ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ዐቢይ፡ ዘምድረ፡ አወገር።…)
II-6) Miracle of the holy water of Ṗäraqliṭos saving from the pest (fols. 30vb-31va) (፮ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... ወመጽአ፡ ፩፡ ብእሲ፡ እምድረ፡ ምምሳሕ፡ እንተ፡ ስማ፡ ይብልዋ፡ ጕንያ፡ ጐዲዮ፡ እምፍርሃተ፡ ብድብድ፡ …)

II-7) Miracle of the church bell stolen from Ṗäraqliṭos and restored (fols. 31va-34ra) (፯ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራ[fol. 31vb]ቅሊጦስ፡ ... ወካዕበ፡ ስምዑ፡ ኦአኃውየ፡ ዘገብረ፡ ተአምረ፡ ወመንክረ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ መንፈሰ፡ ሕይወት፤ ወረድኤቶሙ፡ ለሰማዕታት፡ ኅሩያን፡ ለጻድቃን፡ ወቦአ፡ ፩ብእሲ፡ በድፍረት፡ ኀበ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ ወነሥአ፡ ለዶለ፡ ሐፂን፡…)
II-8) Miracle of the healing of a blind woman (fols. 34rb-34vb) (፰፡ ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... ወሀለወት፡ አሐቲ፡ ብእሲት፡ ዕውርተ፡ ዕይን፡ እምጕንዱይ፡ መዋዕል፨...)

II-9) Miracle of the holy water of Ṗäraqliṭos saving from the pest and men from Mǝsʿǝma and Hagäray (fols. 34rb-36vb) (፱፡ ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... [fol. Fol. 35ra] ስምዑ፡ ካዕበ፡ ኦ፡ አኃውየ፡ ዘከመ፡ ጐዩ፡ ፪ቱ፡ እደው፡ እምፍርሃተ፡ ብድብድ፡ዘቦአ፡ ውስተ፡ ሀገሮሙ፨ ወመጽኡ፡ ኀበ፡ መቃብሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ ፩እምድረ፡ ምስዕማ፡ ወ፩፡ እምድረ፡ ሀገራይ፨…)

II-10) Praise for the church and the martyrs of Ṗäraqliṭos, and list of the provinces from where the faithful come to Ṗäraqliṭos (fols. 36vb-38vb) (፲፩፡ ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... ስምዑኬ፡ አኃውየ፡ ከመ፡ ና[fol. 38ra]ብጽሕ፡ ለክሙ፡ በዐቅሙ፡ ኵሎ፡ ዘይገብሩ፡ ላዕሌክሙ፡ በታሕተ፡ ሰማይ፨…)

II-11) Extensive praise for the church, description of the angels surrounding Ṗäraqliṭos etc. (fols. 38vb-42vb) (፲፪፡ ተአምሪሆሙ፡ ለሰማዕታተ፡ ጰራቅሊጦስ፡ ... [fol. 39rb] ስምዑኬ፡ አኀውየ፡ ከመ፡ እንግርክሙ፡ ዘየዐቢ፡ ወዘይኄይስ፡ እምዘሰማዕክሙ ቀዳሚ፨...).
Miracles 10 and 11 are wrongly numbered as Miracles 11 and 12; the same is in Ms.AP-046.
- Text III (Mälkǝʾa sämaʿtatä Ṗäraqliṭos) is incomplete, the same as in Ms. AP-46.
- Text II (fols. 42vb-44rb) ends with an embedded colophon, likeAP-046.
It states that the work was completed in the month of Śäne, year of mercy 175 (= 1523 A.D), in the time of King Lǝbnä Dǝngǝl, etc. (for more details s.AP-046, “Other details” and “Colophon”).
- This Ms. may be a copy (codex descriptus) of the 16th-cent. Ms.AP-046.

supportDesc.condition: Cuts repaired on fols. 31 and 38. The sewing is slightly damaged.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling (below on fol. 3r).
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The scribe disregarded the ruling on fols. 46ra-47ra (Text III).

handDesc.handNote: - The quality of the script changes on fols. 46ra-47ra (Text III): more written lines have been accomodated and the script is of a smaller size.
- On fol. 20rb l.7, the letter ጵ has the 6th order marker set up on the vertical stroke at the top, oriented to the left. It is an unusual feature for a 20th-cent. Ms. (cp. AP-046, fol. 43ra l.3).
- The letters ሰ and ለ are not easy to distinguish.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with brown tooled leather (turn-ins reddish-brown). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Small holes are visible in the centrefold of the quires, close to the head and to the tail of the Ms.
Blind tooled ornament on the brown leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, triple sine wave, criss cross, interlaced line fillet).
